sentences.sContent: His parents still clung to the misguided belief that his common sense would keep him out of serious trouble.
sentences.sCn: 他的父母依然错误地认为他的常识能让他远离大的麻烦。

sentences.sContent: ...I see way fewer truly effective leaders than I see people stuck in positions of leadership who are sadly incompetent and seriously misguided about their own abilities...
...going against the misguided belief that when it comes to health care...

trans.tranOther: a misguided idea or opinion is wrong because it is based on a wrong understanding of a situation
